name: My One Hotel La Spezia

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This Hotel is hard to find,high on the hill but its not bad.
reviews.title: Funny little hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Elevator in Hotel will take you to the street level where you can shop and or eat out.
reviews.title: Fantastic Staff!

reviews.text: Make sure you insist on a NO smoking room.
reviews.title: Clean, modern and close to the train station

description: My One Hotel is in the city center by the shopping district, 10 minutes' walk either to La Spezia Centrale Railway station and Ferry boat pier to the Cinque Terre and Portovenere. It offers modern design spacious air-conditioned rooms, decorate on warm colour schemes, with satellite TV, safe deposit box and a private bathroom with hairdryer.Our multilingual staff is available 24-hours a day, on request they provide local information and advise. Hotel offers to their Guests devices free Wi-Fi internet connction.
